Because you have installed it wrong.  There should be a gamedata folder inside the constellation folder.  The contents of that gamedata go in your gamedata. 

It should look more like this

![lceUoKp.png](https://i.imgur.com/lceUoKp.png)

> 
> 
> 3 minutes ago, goldenpsp said:
> 
> 
> Because you have installed it wrong.  There should be a gamedata folder inside the constellation folder.  The contents of that gamedata go in your gamedata.

> 

Well... that would explain the issue.

> 
> 
> 42 minutes ago, Alectrisity said:
> 
> 
> Well... that would explain the issue.
> 

FYI with mods, especially parts, they require the exact path under gamedata.  So never change file or folder names or try to move things around.

Nom-o-Matic modules cause errors in the game. When I attach them in editor I get the error: module science experiment does not use IScalarModule.

Several days ago I had a serious disaster when I attached some lights on my Satellite Station it exploded. I thought it was because of the last minor update of KSP. But now I'm 99% this was the cause. The issue appeared after I installed the nom-o-matic on my station.

Unfortunatelly I have started a new game and I cannot provide logs etc but the error still appears in editor.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-02-08T23:53:28Z" title="02/08/2021 11:53  PM" data-short="3 yr">February 8, 2021</time> by alphaprior**

Given that nom o matics do not have a science experiment partmodule on them, I think your princess is in another castle.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-02-09T02:01:22Z" title="02/09/2021 02:01  AM" data-short="3 yr">February 9, 2021</time> by RoverDude**
I don't know why it's says science experiment maybe the part uses some stock model or something? But whenever I use nom-o-matic in editor this message appears.

> 
> 
> 33 minutes ago, alphaprior said:
> 
> 
> I don't know why it's says science experiment maybe the part uses some stock model or something? But whenever I use nom-o-matic in editor this message appears.

The Nom-O-Matics that I include do not have science modules and do not use stock modules.  What specific part is giving you grief?  Maybe a screenshot of the actual part?

Both Nom-O-Matic parts the big one 25000-I and small ones 5000 and 25000. I checked the Observation cupola since they look the same with 5000 no error here.

and here the screenshot a simple test just a pod and Nom-O-Matic 25000-I

Start clean, re-install one by one.

Oh well I have done it already 3 times even started a new game. I have 104 mods and try to keep them updated and only the ones I need.  

I love mods but always cause problems...

**Edited <time datetime="2021-02-09T20:58:48Z" title="02/09/2021 08:58  PM" data-short="3 yr">February 9, 2021</time> by goldenpsp**

> 
> 
> 21 minutes ago, RoverDude said:
> 
> 
> I solve the problem by just using my own and a handful of QoL mods ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
> 

RoverDude you are a modder, and probably programmer and you know how to find problems. My programming skills are very limited and I've found myself spending hours to find problematic mods in various games instead of actually enjoying the game.  

The easy solution someone will say don't use mods or use a few like 10 or so. BUT.... how can I? I mean I use all your mods and among in my mod list are TweakScale, BetterBurnTime, Community parts,tech, categories etc InterstellarFuelSwitch and more... How can I play the game without them? Meh.... Mods bring stuff in games that become essential and they are not just nice add-ons. So essentially frustrating...  

I wish developers to adopt most mods so games run smoothly but... ![:unsure:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_unsure.png ":unsure:")

>

Meh.... Mods bring stuff in games that become essential and they are not just nice add-ons. So essentially frustrating...

Ok. I scrolled back a few pages and must have missed it

Are orange suits still immune to failing life support? I brought Jeb and Bob on a Minmus mission (with a hitchhiker but no supplies) and they both became tourists due to lack of supplies. Is this a bug or has it been changed?
